page.title: 17PLAYGROUP, UNSTONE.
page.content: Est.18 months, supervision Soc.Ser. Grant Parish Council Â£250 equipment. Premises Community Hall,two mornings, 9:30 12:00. Fifteen children,2\_5 yrs. One paid assistant, one mother each session. No fathers! (Though welcome.) Parents charged 60p per session, even if child not attending. Facilities: Wendy house, trampoline, see-saw, climbing-frame & slide, building blocks, sand, water, paints, adhesives. "No nursery in district.Children used to others. Experience freedom; make noise,no-one stops them.Children enjoy it, mothers think it godsend. "Children bake bread, cakes, toffee apples. Plant seeds. Made Mother's Day cards.Trip to Pet's Corner. Others planned fire/police-stations.Local PC visited & "Lollipop" lady.Christmas party, children made decorations."
